thread.title: Romelu Lukaku is “99.9999%” certain to stay at Everton, insists his agent - but there's a catch
thread.title_full: Romelu Lukaku is “99.9999%” certain to stay at Everton, insists his agent - but there's a catch

author: Neil McLeman
title: Romelu Lukaku is “99.9999%” certain to stay at Everton, insists his agent - but there's a catch
text:
Romelu Lukaku's current contract at Everton expires in 2019 (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Romelu Lukaku is “99.9999%” certain to sign a new contract at Everton, his agent has stated. But Mino Raiola hinted the Belgium striker could still leave in the summer. 
Lukaku, who joined Everton for £28m from Chelsea in 2014, has scored 23 goals for club and country this season. 
His deal runs out in 2019 and the Goodison Park club is keen to secure his long-term future. 
Raiola, who is also agent to Paul Pogba and Zlatan Ibrahimovic , told talkSPORT: “That is sure is the intention – I am 99.9999% sure he will sign. Lukaku was on the scoresheet at the weekend when Everton beat Sunderland (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) Lukaku's agent insists the striker is “99.9999%” certain to pen a new deal (Photo: Clive Brunskill) 
"In football, contracts are not there to be gone to the end sometimes. But then there is always a three-party deal then. 
"If everyone thinks it is better to move on, then that will be done at that moment. But for this moment, we are signing a contract with Everton .” 
Raiola said in December “we have 99.9 per cent reached terms.” poll loading Should Romelu Lukaku leave Everton this summer? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
